identity.name: E1
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Typography with Terminal Aesthetics
Emotion First: The user should feel like a 'Power User'
Content is King: Data legibility is paramount
Negative Space: Use density for data, space for structure
Contrast: High contrast for readability in dark mode

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Chivo:wght@100..900&family=Inter:wght@100..900&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@100..800&display=swap');

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(59,130,246,0.5)] transition-all duration-200 font-medium px-6 py-2 rounded-md
buttons.secondary: bg-zinc-800 text-white hover:bg-zinc-700 border border-zinc-700 transition-all duration-200 font-medium px-6 py-2 rounded-md
buttons.ghost: bg-transparent text-zinc-400 hover:text-white hover:bg-zinc-800/50 transition-all duration-200 px-4 py-2 rounded-md

inputs.default: bg-zinc-900/50 border border-zinc-800 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary text-white placeholder:text-zinc-600 rounded-md px-4 py-2 w-full transition-all duration-200 font-mono text-sm

cards.default: bg-[#18181b] border border-zinc-800 p-6 rounded-lg shadow-xl relative overflow-hidden group

uploader.container: border-2 border-dashed border-zinc-700 hover:border-primary/50 bg-zinc-900/20 hover:bg-zinc-900/40 transition-all duration-300 rounded-xl p-12 flex flex-col items-center justify-center cursor-pointer group relative overflow-hidden

table.header: text-xs font-mono text-zinc-500 uppercase tracking-wider border-b border-zinc-800 pb-2

visual_enhancers.textures: bg-[url('https://grainy-gradients.vercel.app/noise.svg')] opacity-20 mix-blend-overlay pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 z-50

backgrounds.description: Dark cubes with glowing green lines

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css FIRST.
3. THEME: Force Dark Mode. Add 'dark' class to the html or body tag, or set background to #09090b in index.css.
4. LAYOUT: Use a 'Bento' style grid. Left side: Controls (Excel URL, Upload). Right side: Live Data Feed (The Table).
6. TABLE: The mapping table is the hero. Make it look like a code editor diff view. Use JetBrains Mono.
7. UPLOAD: The dropzone should feel 'magnetic'. Use hover states and dashed borders that glow on dragOver.
8. NOISE: Add a fixed noise overlay (opacity 0.03) to the entire body to kill the digital flatness.
9. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure all inputs have labels (even if visually hidden) and high contrast focus rings.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Use specific properties for transitions (NOT transition: all).
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
